column1: CIO-CI-Access Team, Ministry of Defence, CIO-FOI@mod.uk

column3: Request Summary
Please provide information on the aggregated data of personnel strength and personnel expenses along with information on the capital expenses of the whole British Armed Forces from 1957 - 1969.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of occasions Mr Adam Werritty has visited the MOD and travelled with Liam Fox on business,  in the past year.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding 61 Fd Sqn and Christmas Island.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of uniformed and civilian lawyers employed at the MOD.
Please provide a list along with information and details of military bases in the African and Middle Eastern theatres of war during the period 1939 - 1945.
Please provide a copy of Part 1 Chapter 5 Lesson 9 of AP 818.
Please provide information and details to various questions regarding the various methods used to dispose of MOD waste.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding the British Armed Forces.
Please advise on the number of new recruits who applied to join the TA and Army from various areas in England, in 2008, 2009 and 2010.

Please provide statistical information on the total of amputations amongst soldiers from 2001 - present.
